name: ttyd
description: Installs ttyd - Share your terminal over the web. The ttyd options (port, cols, fontSize, readOnly) control the auto-generated .devcontainer/ttyd.sh script, but are ignored if a .devcontainer/ttyd.sh file already exists.

version.description: Version of ttyd to install (e.g., '1.7.4' or 'latest')

cols.description: Number of columns for the terminal.

readOnly.description: If true, ttyd will be read-only (removes -W flag).
